aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaye ga්ramiya mattame karyabharayehi nayakathwaya gena, ki්rayathmaka kirime sanwardhana niladhariyaku washayen ha pahasukarayaku lesa puhunu kirime wadasatahanak lesa rajya aarakshaka amathyanshaya magin siyaluma disthi්rakka aawaranaya wana paridi meya sidukarana bawa swadesha katayuthu amathyanshaye athireka lekam ech.ti kamal pathmasiri wisin siyaluma pa්radeshiya lekamwarun wetha yawa athi lipiye handunwadi thibe.mema puhunuwa namkara aththe ‘‘sanwardhana niladharin sandaha nipunatha pa්rawardhana wadasatahana’’ lesaya.
